label: 7-in-1 IAQ Sensor: AM307(L)
description:
AM307 is a 7-in-1 ambience monitoring sensor including the 
measurement of temperature, 
humidity, 
CO2 concentration,
TVOC, 
pressure, 
light, 
motion, etc. 
It can show visually with different modes on the E-ink screen in real-time and transmit to network server using LoRaWANÂ® technology.
